(SELECT #{item.resourceId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.applicationId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.parentResourceId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.resourceName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.resourceContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.resourceDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createdBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createdDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updatedBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updatedDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} FROM DUAL )

AND resource_id = #{resourceId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
